text: The hardest part is starting. Once you're moving, you're unstoppable.
Your future self will thank you for every step you take today.
You don't have to be extreme, just consistent. Tennis consistency makes you win, not sporadic brilliance
Think of exercise as a gift you give to your body, not a punishment.
Every drop of sweat is another step toward your goals.
As you sow, so shall you reap. You can't pour from an empty cup—fill yourself with energy first.
A one-hour workout is only 4% of your day. You owe your better version of yourself to your family to the world! Inspire, motivate
Exercise isn't just about looking good; it's about feeling incredible.
The strongest motivation is Knowing you're capable of more.
Small progress is still progress—don't underestimate the power of showing up.
